meanings.definition: Relating to or having one dimension.
meanings.sent1: The unidimensional line only goes in one direction.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a unidimensional approach to create a simple drawing.
meanings.sent3: The unidimensional puzzle was so easy, even a child could solve it.
meanings.sent4: Her unidimensional thinking limited her ability to see the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: The unidimensional shape looked flat and lacked depth.

meanings.sent1: The unidimensional character in the story was very predictable.
meanings.sent2: The movie's plot was unidimensional, making it boring to watch.
meanings.sent3: His unidimensional taste in music only included one genre.
meanings.sent4: The unidimensional painting failed to evoke any emotions in the viewers.
meanings.sent5: The unidimensional performance lacked the layers needed to captivate the audience.
